data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
At WWK ARENA, Freiburg are penalized for being offside.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
In the minute 3, Freiburg surge into the attack at WWK ARENA but Manuel Guldeâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Manuel Gulde (Freiburg) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 5, Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Augsburg.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Robert Schroder signals a Freiburg throw-in in Augsburg's half.
In the minute 6, Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Augsburg.
Ermedin Demirovic (Freiburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Freiburg to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Freiburg.
In the minute 8, Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In Augsburg Freiburg drive forward through Ermedin Demirovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Free kick Freiburg.
Robert Schroder signals a Augsburg throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
Freiburg to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Daniel Caligiuri (Augsburg) has received a first yellow card.
Freiburg's Vincenzo Grifo breaks free at WWK ARENA. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 22, Robert Schroder awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Freiburg.
Robert Schroder awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
Can Freiburg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Robert Gumny (Augsburg) has received a yellow card from Robert Schroder.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Freiburg close to the penalty box.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Augsburg, Augsburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Robert Schroder awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
Freiburg push upfield but Robert Schroder quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Augsburg.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
Augsburg are pushing forward but Andre Hahn's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Robert Schroder awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
Andre Hahn (Augsburg) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Augsburg.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Tobias Strobl for Augsburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 41, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Freiburg at WWK ARENA.
Vincenzo Grifo for Freiburg is whistled offside.
In the minute 43, Augsburg advance rapidly upfield but Robert Schroder blows for offside.
Robert Schroder signals a Augsburg throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Freiburg push upfield but Robert Schroder quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 45, Augsburg to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Throw-in Freiburg.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The second half has started at WWK ARENA.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Robert Gumny with Marco Richter.
Can Augsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Freiburg's half?
In the minute 48, Robert Schroder signals a Augsburg throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Goal kick for Freiburg at WWK ARENA.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
Freiburg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 53, Freiburg needs to be cautious. Augsburg have an attacking throw-in.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Freiburg's Jonathan Schmid gets in a shot on goal at WWK ARENA. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Augsburg to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
The away team have replaced Ermedin Demirovic with Nils Petersen. This is the first substitution made today by Christian Streich.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
In the minute 61, Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 63, Throw-in high up the field for Freiburg in Augsburg.
Vincenzo Grifo scores to make it 0-1 at WWK ARENA.
Nicolas Hofler with an assist there.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Felix Ohis Uduokhai for Augsburg has been booked by Robert Schroder and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Goal kick for Freiburg at WWK ARENA.
In the minute 73, Augsburg to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Throw-in for Freiburg at WWK ARENA.
Heiko Herrlich is making the team's second substitution at WWK ARENA with Michael Gregoritsch replacing Rani Khedira.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Augsburg.
In the minute 75, In Augsburg, Andre Hahn of Augsburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Augsburg.
Augsburg are coming forward and Michael Gregoritsch gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 75, Robert Schroder awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Augsburg push upfield and Andre Hahn gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Freiburg defence.
Augsburg's Daniel Caligiuri misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 78, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Ruben Vargas gets an equalizer for Augsburg. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Marco Richter to set up the goal.
In the minute 82, At WWK ARENA, Freiburg are penalized for being offside.
Carlos Gruezo is replacing Florian Niederlechner for the home team.
Augsburg's Marco Richter gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Christian Streich (Freiburg) is making a second substitution, with Dominique Heintz replacing Manuel Gulde.
Robert Schroder signals a Freiburg throw-in in Augsburg's half.
In the minute 86, Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Augsburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
In the minute 87, In Augsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Freiburg.
Freiburg's Vincenzo Grifo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
At WWK ARENA the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Augsburg advance rapidly upfield but Robert Schroder blows for offside.
Goal kick for Freiburg at WWK ARENA.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
